attributes.action: massively improve GCSE syllabuses so that they teach things relevant to life in the adult world.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: GCSEs either teach topics totally unimportant (Maths, for example, is focused on surds, quadratic equations), or teach too little to be of any practical value - GCSE German has a finite word-list that is necessary to be memorised, and pupils spend so much time learning for the GCSE that there's no time to actually learn German to a standard of speaking it in Germany.
